Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing in both directions due to police activity at Roosevelt. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing in both directions due to police activity at Roosevelt. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
